summary: A suite of unit tests exercising the FactoredMatrix class, covering initialization rules, indexing semantics, matrix and vector multiplication (including broadcasting and leading‑dimension handling), and core linear‑algebra properties such as transposition, norms, eigen‑decomposition, SVD and reshaping.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the FactoredMatrix implementation to guarantee reliable linear‑algebra operations in downstream scientific and machine‑learning applications.
